name: King of Space!
description:
-

King Of Space! is a 2.5D Platformer created for Bolt Jam #1 August 6-12, 2018.

-

Play as The King of Space! Whilst on his Royal travels, The King suddenly falls to a planet inhabited by angry rock faces! To make matters worse, The King can't leave without finding all his gear again. Luckily, The King has found a Shop where he can buy some Brand New gear and get back to Space!

-

Can you Collect all 100 Coins?

You keep all progress!

Each upgrade adds +2 Attack!

Grey Blocks have 2 HP, Green Blocks have 4 HP, Blue Blocks have 6 HP.

Win : Get To Space!

-

Controls

-

A & D : Movement

Space : Jump

Tab : Shop

Hold Shift : Rocket Boost (When Unlocked)

Hold down Shift to Boost movement of your current direction.

-

-
